Package library.explosions

Class RayScatter

java.lang.Object
library.explosions.RayScatter
public class RayScatter
extends java.lang.Object
Models rayscatter explosions.

      Constructor
      Parameters:
      epicentre - Epicentre of explosion.
      noOfRays - Number of projected rays.

  • Method Details

    • getEpicentre

      public Vectors2D getEpicentre()
      Getter for epicentre variable.
      Returns:
      Returns epicentre of explosion.

    • setEpicentre

      public void setEpicentre​(Vectors2D v)
      Sets the epicentre to a different coordinate.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector position of the new epicentre.

    • castRays

      public void castRays​(int distance)
      Casts rays in 360 degrees with equal spacing.
      Parameters:
      distance - Distance of projected rays.

    • updateRays

      public void updateRays​(java.util.ArrayList<Body> worldBodies)
      Updates all rays.
      Parameters:
      worldBodies - Arraylist of all bodies to update ray projections for.

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, testbed.ColourSettings paintSettings, testbed.Camera camera)
      Debug draw method for rays and intersections.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
      camera - Camera class used to convert points from world space to view space

    • getRays

      public Ray[] getRays()
      Getter for rays.
      Returns:
      Array of all rays part of the ray scatter.
